issue.title: Gazebo 9.0 crashed when trying to visualize links CoM of sdf model

content.raw:
Downstream issue: https://github.com/robotology/icub-gazebo/issues/64 . 

A peculiar feature of that model (related on how it was originally generated) is the non-identity rotation in the transformation between link and the frame of the inertial element, that already highlighted issue in other libraries in the past such as https://github.com/ros/robot_model/pull/66 .

It also has (in the URDF used to generate it) some rotations close to the singularity, that caused other problems: https://github.com/ros/urdfdom_headers/issues/18 .
content.html:
Downstream issue: https://github.com/robotology/icub-gazebo/issues/64 .

A peculiar feature of that model (related on how it was originally generated) is the non-identity rotation in the transformation between link and the frame of the inertial element, that already highlighted issue in other libraries in the past such as https://github.com/ros/robot_model/pull/66 .

It also has (in the URDF used to generate it) some rotations close to the singularity, that caused other problems: https://github.com/ros/urdfdom_headers/issues/18 .
